pages.text: WE ‘IDHA BELEGAL-’ETFALU MINKUMUL-HULUME FELJESTE’DHINU KEMA ESTE’DHENEL-LEDHINE MIN KABLIHIM KEDHALIKE JUBEJJINU ELLAHU LEKUM ‘AJATIHI WEL-LAHU ‘ALIMUN HEKIMUN
